src:
한국당 초선 "우리도 인적혁신 예외아니다…당에 거취 일임"
"김태흠 '정풍운동' 총론 공감…보수통합 적극 지지"오후 2시 성명서 발표 예고…"큰 정치 바란다는 게 공통된 뜻"
07 Nov 2019, 00:54 by (서울=뉴스1) 김민석 기자, 이균진 기자


자유한국당 초선의원들이 7일 서울 여의도 국회 의원회관에서 내년 총선을 앞두고 의견을 나누기 위해 모임을 갖고 있다. 2019.11.7/뉴스1 © News1 김명섭 기자

자유한국당 초선의원들이 7일 당소속 김태흠 의원의 '영남권·강남3구 3선이상 국회의원 용퇴 혹은 수도권 험지 출마론'에 대해 총론에선 공감했다고 밝혔다.아울러 황교안 대표가 전날 밝힌 '보수대통합' 추진에 대해 초선의원들도 적극적으로 지지하며 인적혁신과 보수통합을 위해 당에 거취를 일임하겠다고 다짐했다. 이날 초선의원 모임 간사를 맡은 이양수 의원은 모임 직후 기자들과 만나 "김태흠 의원의 기자회견을 통해 촉발된 당의 인적혁신 문제에 대해 (초선의원들이) 총론에선 공감을 표했다"고 말했다.이날 한국당 초선 모임엔 총 44명 중 25명이 참석했다. 이 의원은 "우리당이 내년 총선 승리를 위해 (인적쇄신을) 추진해야 한다는 데 대해 방법은 다른 부분은 있을 것"이라며 "우리 초선들도 인적혁신을 하는 과정에 예외는 아닐 것"이라고 말했다.이 의원은 "인적 혁신과 관련 당 지도부뿐 아니라 전에 우리 당 지도부를 했단 분들, 소위 말하는 '잠룡'들도 국가를 위해서 나라를 위해서 큰일을 할 분들이기 때문에 당이 원하는 것이라면 어떤 어려움이더라도 마다하지 않고 해주실 거라 믿는다"며 "더 큰 정치를 하길 바란다는 게 초선 의원들의 공통된 뜻"이라고 강조했다.


자유한국당 초선의원들이 7일 서울 여의도 국회 의원회관에서 내년 총선을 앞두고 의견을 나누기 위해 모임을 갖고 있다. 2019.11.7/뉴스1 © News1 김명섭 기자

이날 오전 모임을 가진 초선의원들은 모임에 참석하지 못한 의원들의 의견도 모은 후 이날 오후 2시 초선의원 합동 성명서를 발표할 예정이다.이 의원은 성명서와 관련, "오늘 치열하게 토론한 다양한 이야기를 (성명서에) 담을 것"이라며 "참석하지 못한 의원들의 의견도 들은 후 성명서를 발표하겠다"고 밝혔다.이 의원은 자발적 불출마에 대한 논의는 없었는지 물음에 "그런 논의는 없었다"며 "보수통합과 총선 승리를 위해 기득권 내려놓고 당에 일임하겠다"고 밝혔다. ideaed@news1.kr
text:
First Korean Party "We're no exception to human innovation… it's going to be a party"
"Kim Tae-heum's general sentiment movement sympathizes with the consensus… Active support for consolidation" Notice announced at 2:00 pm… "I want common politics."
07 Nov 2019, 00:54 by (Seoul = News 1) Reporter Kim Min-seok, Lee Kyun-jin


Liberal Korean lawmakers meet on July 7 at Yeouido's National Assembly in Seoul to share their opinions ahead of next year's general election. January 1, 2019 / News 1 © News1

Liberal Korean ruling party officials said yesterday that they agreed with the party leader Kim Tae-hum's resignation of the parliamentary party for three or more elections in Yeongnam and Gangnam, or the candidacy of the capital region. First-time lawmakers also actively supported and vowed to take over the party for human innovation and conservative integration. Representative Lee Yang-soo, who served as the secretary of the first-day congressional meeting, met with reporters immediately after the meeting and said, "The first members of the party expressed their empathy in response to the" personal innovation "issue of the party, which was triggered by the press conference of the lawmaker." Of the total 44 people, 25 attended. Lee said, "There will be other ways in which the Uri Party should push for human victory to win the next year's general election," he said. "Our initials will not be exceptions to the process of human innovation." The lawmakers said, "The people who had not only the party leadership related to human innovation, but also our former party leadership, and the so-called" dragon dragons "who do the big work for the country for the country, do not believe anything difficult if the party wants. "We want to see greater politics," he said.


Liberal Korean lawmakers meet on July 7 at Yeouido's National Assembly in Seoul to share their opinions ahead of next year's general election. January 1, 2019 / News 1 © News1

The first-day congressmen who gathered at the meeting will gather comments from members who did not attend the meeting, and they will issue a joint statement of the second-member parliament at 2 pm on the same day. "We would like to publish a statement after hearing the opinions of those who did not attend," he said. "There was no such discussion." I will lay down my vested right to win the victory. ” ideaed@news1.kr
